name: A Matter of Murder
description: A Matter of Murder is a point-and-click puzzle game with rogue-like elements. The details of each murder are procedurally generated, so each case is different every time you play with progressively more challenging logic puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo CPU 2.66 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 761 MB available space
